remarks: A bounded monotonic sequence converges to the supremum of its range. Theorem 12-5.1 of [Gleason] p. 180.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Feb-2014.)
statement:
climsup.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climsup.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climsup.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> RR ) $.
climsup.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) <_ ( F ` ( k + 1 ) ) ) $.
climsup.5 $e |- ( ph -> E. x e. RR A. k e. Z ( F ` k ) <_ x ) $.
climsup $p |- ( ph -> F ~~> sup ( ran F , RR , < ) ) $.
$d F k x $.
$d Z k x $.
$d k ph $.
